title: [Team CeltiCraft] The Domain of Ra'vane - 拉瓦内领域
author: LocusAzzurro
txt_content:
本帖最后由 LocusAzzurro 于 2016-12-11 13:37 编辑 

拉瓦内领域The Domain of Ra'vane
 作品介绍 

各位好

我们很荣幸向你们展示我们最新的作品：拉瓦内之域。我们在法国活动MineServExposition 2016期间的一周时间里完成了它。RoiLouis (法国实况主)和他的建筑师们("Macons du Cube")在这次活动中组织了一次建筑比赛，这次建筑的主题是“魔法”，我们也赢得了这场比赛的胜利。

Hello everyone 

We are glad to present our most recently project : The Domain of Ra'Vame. We did that in one week on the occasion of MineServExposition 2016, a french event. RoiLouis (a french youtuber) and his builders ("Macons du Cube") did a build contest on this event. The theme was "magic" and we won this contest :) 
建筑师 : 
Artase 
Zamal 
Mister_Pocket 
Roomenn 
Angels45 

录制 : 
Guss 

渲染 : 
Matibian 
Barbarian
